explanation: [0-0] In a football match, there are two teams on the field, one in blue jerseys and the other in white. A player in a blue jersey and a player in a white jersey are chasing a football, surrounded by many players ready to receive the ball. In the upper right corner of the screen, there is a white "LALIGA" caption and a white logo.

[0-10] Then, the blue player receives the ball and passes it to his teammate in front of him. His teammate lifts his foot and passes the ball to another teammate on the sideline. The white players around can only turn around and defend the blue player who is receiving the ball. At this time, a white player comes forward and intercepts the ball that is about to be passed. Behind him, several players surround the ball and scramble for it. Then, a blue player takes advantage of the white player's inattention and kicks the ball out. His teammate receives the ball and starts to dribble through the white players surrounding him. This man just turned around and was blocked by the white player behind him and fell to the ground, the football also ran forward alone.
